title: Creative Language Expression and Environmental Awareness Development Through Slam Poetry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Conducted in a limited technological environment focused on smartphones, with learners comprising non-degree students or job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can create slam poetry on environmental issues using multimodal literacy instructional methods
Enhance creative expression in poetry writing through peer feedback and instructor guidance
Recognize local community environmental issues and connect them to social awareness through poetic works

resources: Case Compilation of Local Environmental Issues
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
